mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dust( sn, clearVal, districtName, dataDate, issueVal, issueTime, clearDate, issueDate, moveName, clearTime, issueGbn, itemCode )VALUES( #{sn}, #{clearVal}, #{districtName}, #{dataDate}, #{issueVal}, #{issueTime}, #{clearDate}, #{issueDate}, #{moveName}, #{clearTime}, #{issueGbn}, #{itemCode} )
